article_node.title: Fed’s Musalem Says Balanced Policy Approach Is Important
article_node.summary: Fed official Musalem emphasizes a balanced policy stance, noting that the current modestly restrictive rate aligns with full employment and core inflation near 2%. He warns that overemphasizing either labor or inflation could trigger yield curve steepening, term premium rises, or inflation expectations, potentially harming the economy. The Fed’s forward‑looking approach must weigh risks and time horizons to keep employment and price stability in sync.
